org.lasarobotics.vision.util

Enum ScreenOrientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ScreenOrientation>
      • org.lasarobotics.vision.util.ScreenOrientation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ScreenOrientation>

    public enum ScreenOrientation
extends java.lang.Enum<ScreenOrientation>
    Rotation relative to the horizontal positive x-axis (east) and increasing counterclockwise
